title: Create FO-05 fo-experience main component
description:
Create the main FO-05 experience component that orchestrates all steps.

Files to create:
- app/fo-05/components/fo-experience.tsx

Copy from app/fo-04/components/fo-experience.tsx and update:
1. Import from local FO-05 components
2. Import actions from ../actions (FO-05 actions)
3. Update DynamicScreenData interface to use initialFragments/expandedFragments
4. Update dynamic step value handling - no selectedChips, just text
5. When passing value to StepDynamic, only pass { text: string }

The overall flow (12 steps) remains the same as FO-04.
acceptance_criteria: app/fo-05/components/fo-experience.tsx exists; uses FO-05 actions and components; npm run build succeeds
closed_reason: Created fo-experience.tsx for FO-05 with updated imports for local components and FO-05 actions. Changed exchange answer type from selectedChips to selectedFragments. Build succeeds.
